field.label: Ether Address
field.help: Hardware MAC address of the client (format xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx).

field.label: IP address
field.help: IP address to assign to the provided MAC address, which will either end up in the ARP (IPv4) or NDP (IPv6) table.

field.label: Description
field.help: You may enter a description here for your reference (not parsed).
